TestCase.name: testDDLTableScan
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM src WHERE a > 1
LogicalProject(ts=[$0], a=[$1], b=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]])
Calc(select=[ts, a, b], where=[(a > 1)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, filter=[]]], fields=[ts, a, b])

TestCase.name: testDDLWithComputedColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM computed_column_t
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)], d=[TO_TIMESTAMP($1)], e=[my_udf($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, computed_column_t]])
Calc(select=[a, b, (a + 1) AS c, TO_TIMESTAMP(b) AS d, my_udf(a) AS e]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, computed_column_t]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testDDLWithProctime
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM proctime_t
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)], d=[TO_TIMESTAMP($1)], e=[my_udf($0)], ptime=[PROCTIME()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, proctime_t]])

Calc(select=[a, b, (a + 1) AS c, TO_TIMESTAMP(b) AS d, my_udf(a) AS e, PROCTIME_MATERIALIZE(PROCTIME()) AS ptime]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, proctime_t]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testDDLWithWatermarkComputedColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM c_watermark_t
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)], d=[TO_TIMESTAMP($1)], e=[my_udf($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, c_watermark_t]])
Calc(select=[a, b, (a + 1) AS c, TO_TIMESTAMP(b) AS d, my_udf(a) AS e]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, c_watermark_t]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testLegacyTableSourceScan
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testTableApiScanWithComputedColumn
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)], d=[TO_TIMESTAMP($1)], e=[my_udf($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, computed_column_t]])
Calc(select=[a, b, (a + 1) AS c, TO_TIMESTAMP(b) AS d, my_udf(a) AS e]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, computed_column_t]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testTableApiScanWithDDL
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])
TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testTableApiScanWithWatermark
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)], d=[TO_TIMESTAMP($1)], e=[my_udf($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, c_watermark_t]])
Calc(select=[a, b, (a + 1) AS c, TO_TIMESTAMP(b) AS d, my_udf(a) AS e]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, c_watermark_t]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testTableApiScanWithTemporaryTable
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])
TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]], fields=[word])
